description.value: At 8th level, choose an alignment (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful) that is opposite to one axis of your own. Once chosen, this cannot be changed. Add your Wisdom bonus on caster level checks to overcome the spell resistance of creatures with the chosen alignment subtype; dispel effects with the chosen alignment descriptor; and remove curses, diseases, and poisons. A neutral inquisitor gains only the bonus on caster level checks to remove curses, diseases, and poisons.
